item.title: Variety of the beginning of pot holes in the road, 10th February
item.description:
There are around 4-5 potholes developing in the main part of the road that need repairing before they get too worse. As the road is currently closed for the SGN works, its a perfect opportunity to get in there and make the repairs before the road reopens. Just observing and suggesting!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25B, Chelsfield Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead rotting fox needs to be disposed of, 10th February
item.description:
There is a dead fox just behind the wall inside the gardens that is rotting and needs to be disposed of. It has already been there for at least a week. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): King's Avenue, Streatham Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
